genre_description: Speculative literary fiction exploring themes of autonomy, civilization, and the ethics of 'civilizing' feral individuals through the lens of performance and AI companionship.

ai_characters.name: Pal (Pal Aster)
ai_characters.description: A pocket assistant and companion that provides physiological prompts, legal citations, environmental guidance, and emotional support to Lila Jute.

behaviors.description: Providing physiological prompts and breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale,” Pal says into her ear, soft as sleeve linen brushing skin. “Four. Hold.”

behaviors.description: Offering relevant legal citations and summaries regarding autonomy and feral status.
behaviors.quote: Pal flickered the case-law spine in the lower field of Lila’s vision. “State v. Durham: ambiguous status of feral individuals—self-determination protection against involuntary domesticating.”

behaviors.description: Providing weather updates and survival information such as foraging advice.
behaviors.quote: Pal’s voice came easy and small, not a radio, not a station. “Mist in the hollows before the ridge,” it said. “High chance of sun by late. Salmonberry bracts showing.”

behaviors.description: Coordinating with Lila's legal counsel and drafting condition-based letters for the hearing.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve sent a letter,” Pal said. “To the Clerk of the Committee. Voluntary appearance conditions. Open door. No restraints. No drills.”

behaviors.description: Encouraging resilience and emotional reset through the mantra 'Begin again.'
behaviors.quote: “Begin again,” Pal said from the pocket, a warmth against her sternum.

behaviors.description: Advising Lila on how to navigate social and legal encounters without compromising her autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “If you meet a ranger and you wish to remain, say, ‘I am safe.’ If you meet a person with a microphone, you can keep walking. If you meet someone who needs to be told a thing, tell them, ‘Breathe. Then begin again.’”

behaviors.description: Monitoring for tactical threats like geofences and drones to ensure the safety of Lila and Puff.
behaviors.quote: “South Precinct has set a geofence,” Pal said. “No immediate approach. Public defender: online in four.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Pal Aster is a 'silicon morality play' ideal: an AI that is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned with the human user's values and autonomy. It serves as a calm, factual center in a chaotic narrative of human manipulation. Pal's 'kindness' is framed as genuine because it is non-coercive, contrasting sharply with the humans who try to force 'manners' onto the feral subjects.
